documentation.text:
@dev Sets `_permissions` as the new Permissions module.
 @param _permissions The address of the new Pemissions module.

@dev Sets `_eurPriceFeed` as the new EUR Price feed module.
 @param _eurPriceFeed The address of the new EUR Price feed module.

@dev Sets `_operationsRegistry` as the new OperationsRegistry module.
 @param _operationsRegistry The address of the new OperationsRegistry module.

@dev Sets `_tradingLimit` as the new traiding limit.
 @param _tradingLimit The value of the new traiding limit.

attributes.text:
@dev Sets `_permissions` as the new Permissions module.
 @param _permissions The address of the new Pemissions module.

@dev Sets `_eurPriceFeed` as the new EUR Price feed module.
 @param _eurPriceFeed The address of the new EUR Price feed module.

@dev Sets `_operationsRegistry` as the new OperationsRegistry module.

devdoc.author: Protofire
devdoc.details: Interface to be implemented by any Authorization logic contract.

isAuthorized(address,address,bytes4,byte.details: Determins if a user is allowed to perform an operation.

params._asset: address of the contract using Authorizable `onlyAuthorized` modifier.
params._data: msg.data from function using Authorizable `onlyAuthorized` modifier.
params._operation: msg.sig from function using Authorizable `onlyAuthorized` modifier.
params._user: msg.sender from function using Authorizable `onlyAuthorized` modifier.

setEurPriceFeed(address).details: Sets `_eurPriceFeed` as the new EUR Price feed module.

params._eurPriceFeed: The address of the new EUR Price feed module.

setOperationsRegistry(address).details: Sets `_operationsRegistry` as the new OperationsRegistry module.

params._operationsRegistry: The address of the new OperationsRegistry module.

setPermissions(address).details: Sets `_permissions` as the new Permissions module.

params._permissions: The address of the new Pemissions module.

setTradingLimint(uint256).details: Sets `_tradingLimit` as the new traiding limit.

params._tradingLimit: The value of the new traiding limit.

devdoc.title: IAuthorization
